features: A set of two remote control toy cars for toddlers with 3 buttons for music and sound, two interchangeable action figures, and two remote controls that move the cars forward and backward left. Adorable cars are colorful, egg shaped, include 3 fun sounds, and flashing headlights. remote car kids toddler remote control car 2 year old boy birthday gift

We designed Dino Chasers as your child's first remote control toy car. The cars are easy to control with big button remote controls. They use independent frequencies, so they can race together! Remote Control Car toys for 4 year old boys, dinosaur toys for kids 3-5

Quick and easy set up - Cars require 3 AA batteries (not included) and remote controls require 2 AA batteries (not included). Place the batteries in both vehicles and controllers and watch your toddlers have hours of racing fun! 2 year old toys for boys, toddler toys age 2-4
Great for holiday gifts - Dino Chasers remote control cars can be played on desks and on any hard flat surface. toys for 3 year old boys, 5 year old boy birthday gift, 3 year old boy gift,

At MindSprout we grow young minds by developing fun, safe, and engaging products that stimulate children while entertaining them. We grow smiles by making toys that children want to play with, and that parents trust. dinosaur toys for kids 2-4, dinosaur toys for kids 5-7

Dino Chasers require 10 new AA batteries (not included) to operate. 3 batteries per car and 2 batteries per remote control. Remote control units are color coordinated to match each car: Blue remote controls blue car, green remote controls green car

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best present ever! My daughter loves playing with these. They are super easy to use for a three year old. And they are cute and make neat sounds. Very much recommend. They are a bit on the smaller size but perfect for a toddler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars UPDATE: CARS REPLACED And are working beautifully! CARS STOPPED WORKING IN ONE CAR WITHIN A WEEK.
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: After reading my review the company reached out to me in the kindest way. They then sent a new set of cars to my grandkids, without my even asking. They were delivered very quickly. The cars are working beautifully and these littles are as happy as Christmas morning. Very happy with this company's integrity and customer service. The kindness they showed was above and beyond! Without question, I would feel very comfortable purchasing from them again.These remote cars were the hit of my 2 and 3-year-old grandchildren's Christmas morning. They loved them! The problem is they are not durable enough to last more than a few days. One car had broken gears by New Year's Eve - it lasted 6 days. These cars were only played with at my home (grandparent) and always played with appropriately as directed. Very sad they are not made for actual play. Very disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome, simple race cars for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: These little cars are great for my two year old. They only have two buttons, and are very easy to maneuver. The lights are bright, the sound and music is clear and loud. The design is adorable! Overall, high quality toy. Would purchase as a gift next time I need one for a toddler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much fun!
reviews.reviewText: The cars are a lot of fun and work well on carpet. They go pretty fast and the controls are easy! My 2 year old LOVES running around while we drive them and occasionally presses the buttons. She will have the easy controls figured out in no time! Any kid (and adult) will love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and fun
reviews.reviewText: These are cute and fun and my little one loves playing with them. 4/5 cause on both remotes, one of the buttons stick which can be frustrating, but still fully functional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: Update:Within an hour or two of my original review going live, the company reached out to me and offered to replace the broken toy at no cost. While I wish I could have found a customer service contact so I didn’t have to leave a bad review in the first place, the point is that when they did reach out, they were quick to reply and solved the problem. They even sent the replacement via expedited shipping. I waited a couple weeks before updating to see how the new cars held up, and I am happy to say that they are still in good working condition and still a favorite for my two year old. I would buy from this company again knowing that they stand behind their products.Original Review:My two year old LOVED these cars. They were easily his favorite birthday gift. He’s owned them for a total of 5 days and one of the cars is already broken. The front wheel is loose and can’t be controlled by the remote. It’s not visibly broken and the wheel doesn’t come out. It’s just loose and not connecting with whatever is run by the remote. The music button still works, but the toy is essentially useless. Such a disappointment. Yes, they were owned by a two year old, so he’s not exactly gentle with them. However he also is not a destructive kid and wasn’t overly rough with these. I’m not sure if we just got a lemon or if they are all this fragile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They come in a very tiny box, so I was thinking I may have just wasted my money, but they are actually super cute and my 2 year old loves them. They are durable and zip around super quick! Very easy to control for little kids; There is just Two buttons on the controller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: My grandson loved the toy as his Christmas gift at first but one of the cars stopped working by the end of January. After reporting the problem, the company reached out and replaced the item. I appreciate them greatly
